Sourcing candidates for The Staffing App (ATS)

Easiest way to source your candidates.
The Staffing App allows you to add LinkedIn profiles to your missions and contact them easily.
You can then manage the recruiting flow either with the extension or from the dedicated website that goes along with it.

If you need help getting started, please contact us at contact@thestaffing.app
